text: The women's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Karen Gear Jennifer Meadows Tracey Duncan Helen Thieme ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Aleksandra Pielużek Aneta Lemiesz Monika Bejnar Justyna Karolkiewicz ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Natalya Zhuravlyova Natalya Sidorenko Yuliya Gurtovenko Antonina Yefremova ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships – Women's 4 × 400 metres relay
